executable.title: Extract Features
executable.description: Extracts a variety of features from a folder of annotated whole-slide image
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of efforts in digital pathology by the Sarder Lab: SUNY Buffalo.

directory.name: inputFolder
directory.label: Training Data Folder
directory.description: Select the folder containing the annotated slides to be analyzed

file.name: slide_labels
file.label: Slide label key - (Excel file)
file.description: An excel file containing labels for the slides

file.name: output_filename
file.label: Output Excel Filename
file.description: Select the name and location of the Excel file produced. By default this will be saved in your Private folder.

string-vector.name: classes
string-vector.label: Training layers
string-vector.description: A comma spearated list of the annotation layer names used for feature extraction. The name needs to match exactly.

boolean.name: use_microns
boolean.label: Convert pixels to microns.
boolean.description: Convert features measured in pixels to microns.

parameters.label: Girder API URL and Key
parameters.description: A Girder API URL and token for Girder client
